game.title: Search for the Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and retrieve the Lost Artifact
game.description: The king has ordered you to seek out the Lost Artifact, which was stolen from the kingdom's treasury by unknown thieves. The artifact was last seen in the hands of the Thieves Guild operating throughout the kingdom.
game.reward: 5000 Gold pieces and a unique weapon

task.objective: Visit the local tavern to gather information
task.description: Talk to the bartender at the local tavern. He might have heard some rumors about the Thieves Guild's activities.
Find the hideout of the Thieves Guild and recover the Lost Artifact. Be careful not to get caught!
